author: Staff Reporter
text: The police registered a case against 19 dyeing unit owners for operating the units without effluent treatment plants and letting the effluent into River Cauvery and polluting it in Komarapalayam. Despite warning from the Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board (TNPCB) against letting effluents into the river, many units continue to violate the norms. Demolition and sealing of units failed to control the functioning of these units.
title: Case against 19 dyeing unit owners
